description:
no cowardly way out I'm afraid...
I know waking up to the bigger picture of whats going on in the world is a harsh truth to face, but wishing that things aren't what they are isn't going to change the situation so it's better to come to terms with what is and then work toward solutions because ""they"" aren't simply going to give up just because we discovered their true motives, in fact they'll most likely be even more ruthless about furthering their agendas now that people are waking up to what's really been going on, it's time to revolutionize folks.
